title: Elijah Cummings death: Senior Democrat at centre of Trump impeachment probe dies, aged 68
text:
A senior Democrat who was a key figure in the Donald Trump impeachment probe has died.

Elijah Cummings was pronounced dead in the early hours of Thursday morning after suffering "complications concerning longstanding health challenges," his office announced.

The congressman, who chaired the Democratic House Oversight and Reform Committee chair, had been admitted to hospital for a "medical procedure" last month.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

The Maryland representative said at the time he expected to be "back in the office in a week or so".

More follows…
description: A senior Democrat who was a key figure in the Donald Trump impeachment probe has died. Elijah Cummings was pronounced dead in the early hours of Thursday morning after suffering "complications concerning longstanding health challenges," his office announced. The congressman, who chaired the Democratic House Oversight and Reform Committee chair, had been admitted to hospital
